subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: C. J. Leslie had 25 points, and Richard Howell outplayed Duke’s Mason Plumlee, a contender for national player of the year, in the second half to carry North Carolina State.
snippet: C. J. Leslie had 25 points, and Richard Howell outplayed Duke’s Mason Plumlee, a contender for national player of the year, in the second half to carry North Carolina State.
